name: Mapories
description: A full-stack geospatial memory journal allowing users to anchor stories to specific coordinates. Optimized for high-density data using server-side PostGIS bounding-box queries and frontend marker clustering. Features a defense-in-depth security architecture with HTTP-only cookie-based JWT authentication, IP rate limiting (SlowAPI), and automated bot protection (reCAPTCHA & honeypots).

name: Rail Network Graph
description: Desktop application for railway connection search and network visualization. Integrates GTFS schedules with geospatial railway data to build a time-expanded navigation graph. Features an interactive interface (CustomTkinter + Matplotlib) for route planning, exact distance calculation via KD-Tree snapping, and dynamic ticket pricing.

name: Passes Per Minute
description: Data analysis tool providing football metrics (passes per minute by position) using StatsBomb Open Data. Features a Streamlit dashboard with pitch visualizations and utilizes multithreading for high-performance concurrent data fetching.

name: SpeechScan
description: A desktop application that transcribes audio and analyzes word frequency from MP3 files and YouTube videos. Built with Python and PyQt5, it employs a multithreaded architecture (QThread) to ensure a responsive UI during asynchronous operations like media downloading (using yt-dlp) and cloud-based transcription via the AssemblyAI API.

name: DataTransfer
description: A cross-platform productivity tool enabling instant text transfer from Windows to Android. Features a stealthy system tray application with custom slide animations built in PyQt5, paired with a native Android client. Powered by Firebase Cloud Messaging (FCM) for real-time delivery.

name: Maze Game
description: An interactive arcade maze game developed with Pygame. Features a robust user authentication system backed by SQLite for tracking personal and global leaderboards. Implements precise collision detection, multiple level definitions, and a custom UI system using pygame-menu.

name: Notepadark
description: A dark-themed desktop text editor built with Python and Tkinter. Distinguished by a clean UI with smart, auto-hiding scrollbars that vanish when content fits the window. Features include robust file management with autosave, a comprehensive find/replace tool, and dynamic zoom functionality.

name: Portfolio Gallery
description: A modern, responsive portfolio dashboard built with React and Vite. It dynamically renders project tiles from JSON data using a modular component architecture. Features include a 'smart' preview system that calculates viewport positioning to prevent clipping, strict TypeScript typing, and polished Tailwind CSS animations.
